      • DirectedNode

        public DirectedNode(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> i,
            java.lang.Double v,
            java.lang.Double t,
            java.util.ArrayList<Edge> in,
            java.util.ArrayList<Edge> out)
        Constructor to create an abstract Node.
        Parameters:
        i - the 3-dimensional coordinate ID assigned to this Node.
        v - the initial value stored by this Node.
        t - the firing threshold of this Node.
        in - the synaptic Edges from which this Node receives action potentials
        out - the synaptic Edges to which this Node sends action potentials
